title: Gallery Conversation: What’s in a Label? (Oct 26)
short_description: Join Ginia Shubik Sweeney, director of Interpretation, for a conversation about the decisions that shape and re-shape artwork labels in the galleries.
description:
How does the museum decide what to include in the labels that accompany works of art, and how has this philosophy changed over time? What power do these texts have to shape our experiences of art and the historical narratives we learn?

Join Ginia Shubik Sweeney, director of Interpretation, for a conversation about the decisions that shape and re-shape artwork labels in the galleries.

Please note that this is an in-person event that takes place at the museum.

In accordance with state and City of Chicago guidelines, visitors to the museum are no longer required to wear masks or provide proof of vaccination. Anyone who would like to continue to wear a mask is welcome to do so. Learn more about our visiting policies and what to expect.

If you have any questions about programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu.
